descriptionHtml:
Updates

Version 1.6 - Initial release

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14352-1-1337526944.jpg[/img]
Milky Girl Races by Gilgoon

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14352-1-1337526420.png[/img]
This mod adds new races, Milkygirl Warrior, Assassin and Mage.
Milkygirl uses separate body and textures. So, do not affect the vanilla races.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14352-2-1337526489.png[/img]
Features
 1) Pink nipple, Red skin, CBBE
 2) Warrior character( +5 each Two-handed, Block, Smithing, Heavy armor, Light armor, Archery 
                      and  +10 One-handed)
 3) Racial ability
     *Nord Race : Frost Resistance 50%
     *Nord Battle Cry : Targets flee for 30 seconds, once per day.
     *Berserker Rage : You take half damage and do double damage for 60 seconds.(Reference Video)

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14352-1-1337526487.png[/img]
Features
 1) Pink nipple, Dark skin, CBBE
 2) Assassin character( +5 each One-handed, Sneak, Alchemy, Illusion, Light armor, Pickpocket 
                       and +10 Archery )
 3) Racial ability
     *Redguard Race : Poison Resistance 50%
     *Invisibility Assassin : You are become invisible.(Reference Video)

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14352-3-1337526490.png[/img]
Features
 1) Pink nipple, Milky skin, UNP
 2) Mage character( +5 each Alteration, Illusion, Conjuration, Restoration, Alchemy, Enchanting 
                       and +10 Destruction )
 3) Racial ability
     *Breton Race : Magic Resistance 25%.
     *Breton Race : Absorb Magicka.
     *Conjure Dragon Priest : Summons a Dragon Priest for 60 seconds.(Reference Video)


[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14352-2-1337526423.png[/img]
Step 1. Extract the file. 
Step 2. Copy and paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
Step 3. Check these files in game launcher. 
        RaceCompatibility.esm 
        Milkygirlwarrior.esp 
        Milkygirlassassin.esp
        Milkygirlmage.esp

Optional 1. Jasmin ENB 4.6 Config : if you want to represent like a screenshot, Copy to Skyrim folder(not Data folder) 
            Low - performance, Medium - DOF, High - DOF and SSAO

* More Information - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12549

Optional 2. Optional ESP Files Folder : Patched Extended colors. You can select 6528 colors. 
                                       If you want to use these files, the original esp files must be unchecked. 
                                       And change value \"bDoDepthOfField=0\" in skyrimpreifs.ini 

* More Information - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923


[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14352-3-1337526423.png[/img]
Delete these files:
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\MikyGirl
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\MilkyGirlAssassin
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\MilkyGirlMage
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\MikyGirl
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\MilkyGirlAssassin
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\MilkyGirlMage
Data\\scripts\\PlayerVampireQuestScript.pex
Data\\scripts\\PlayerWerewolfChangeScript.pex
Data\\scripts\\C03RampageQuest.pex
Data\\scripts\\companionshousekeepingscript.pex
Data\\scripts\\GenericRaceController.pex
Data\\scripts\\YakshaRaceController.pex
Data\\scripts\\MilkyGirlMageController.pex
Data\\scripts\\MilkyGirlRaceController.pex
RaceCompatibility.esm
MilkyGirlRaceWarrior.esp
MilkyGirlRaceAssassin.esp
MilkyGirlRaceMage.esp

Or you can just simply deactivate esp file in game launcher.


[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14352-4-1337526423.png[/img]
